column1: Expected Family Contribution (composite) 1999-2000 by Race/ethnicity (historical) 1999-2000. Filtered by PLUS loan total 1999-2000 (X >= 204).
! Interpret data with caution. Estimate is unstable because the standard error represents more than 30 percent of the estimate.
The names of the variables used in this table are: EFC4, RACE1, and  PLUSAMT. The variable names are unique identifiers. To locate these variables, enter the variable name in the search box.
The weight variable used to calculate the data is WTA000
NOTE: Detail may not sum to totals because of rounding.
Source: U.S. Department of Education, National Center for Education Statistics, National Postsecondary Student Aid Study: 2000 Undergraduates (NPSAS:UG).
